name: Find Clue-Braindom Game
description:
Find clue is a puzzle game for finding special clues. You need to think about the problems in the game, find hidden clues, and point out the correct goal. Every case is mysterious, exciting, and challenging! Come and find the clues and find out the truth!

The logic of the find clue game seems simple but brain-burning. Some correct clues may surprise you, but they are reasonable. You need to use your brain and think carefully!
This is not a simple brain teaser or finding the difference game. In the find clue game, you will become a clue hunter, pull through the layers of fog, and find accurate answers.

FEATURES
- Different game scenarios require different clues, different riddles, and solutions to solve the puzzle.
- Simple but brain-burning, you can try various methods.
- Brain test, including word game, trivia game, hidden object game, and other puzzle games.
- The storyline is very rich, you can develop your brain in the game, make your brain thinking more active, and enjoy the new fun of puzzle games.
- Tricky puzzles, puzzle games, and mental tests contain many trivia questions that will boost your brainpower and insight.
- As a riddle master and detective, you need to solve small clues to determine who is the mastermind of the project.
- Brain out, please explore the infinite braindom!
- Puzzle games for free.

TIPS
- Think about the puzzle in another way.
- The clues that seem right may be wrong, focus on tiny hidden object clues.
- Remember to use hints, it can help you find the right clues quickly!

In the find clue game, new adventures for you to go on all the time! Visit facebook.com/noxjoygames if you have any feedback, need help on beating a level, or have any awesome ideas you would like to see in the game!

In addition, we also provide other puzzle games, such as "pin rescue" and "brain master"! More interesting puzzle games look forward to your exploration!
